entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
